verbose_text: Simvastatin prevented the apoptosis of retinal cells by attenuating the increases in the expression of TNF-alpha / NF-kappaB and restoring the balance of the apoptotic signaling protiens Bcl-2 and Bax.
evidence: Simvastatin prevented the apoptosis of retinal cells by attenuating the increases in the expression of TNF-alpha/NF-kappaB and restoring the balance of the apoptotic signaling protiens Bcl-2 and Bax
